brief.brief: The document view associated with the knowledge document type.
Document views provide users a way to:
1) customize how the information displays in each form and

2) limit users to see only the information that their group permission allows them to see. This way, users with different permissions view the same document records, but only those users with certain permissions can view sensitive information in certain fields of the record.

detail.detail: 1) The HTML view data that describes how to format and display the knowledge document fields
4) The knowledge groups that can access this view of a document

5) The security level of the view, which is used to determine which document view the system displays when a user is a member of several knowledge groups. The system uses the document view that has the highest security level for the particular user.
